archiefmat.scope: Contains correspondence received from the District Commissioners and other colonial authorities regarding immigrants working on the plantations. Apart from Chinese indentured laborers it also concerns Portuguese immigrants from Madeira and people from the British West Indies, mainly Guyana and Barbados. Information can be found on conflicts, mutations (births and deaths), status of contract, health etc. In returns (extracts from the registers of immigrants) details regarding origin, sex, religion, 'moral behavior', last place of residence before arriving in Suriname, etc. are recorded.
archiefmat.notes: The complete series (nos. 134-334) up to 1925 consists of 59 volumes and 143 packs.
